Header.title: Kernel Domain Innovations
Header.paragraph: Provider of technology, infrastructure, and software to hyper-scale businesses. Our solutions are built on A.I foundational data to generate innovative insights. Our products derive efficiencies by automation powered by insights from Machine Learning based inter-disciplinary LLM models.

About.paragraph: Our technology solutions are targeted for Pharma Drug Discovery, Financial Services, and Secure Technology Infrastructure
Why: Tech Strategy and Architecture solutions for Multi-Cloud, Hybrid & On-Premise
Data Lakehouse to Warehouse blueprints & managed solution platform [Databricks, Snowflake, Cloud-Native]
Secure Technology Infrastructure Accelerators & Bespoke solutions

Features.title: Intelli Cure
Features.text: A.I Powered accelerated drug discovery and formulations. Drive innovation in A.I and in-silico clinical trial simulations to foster bridge gaps in inter-disciplinary biomedical research, data science, and software development, ensuring a seamless flow across domains. Accelerate innovations powered by LLM models with in-silico medicine standard as a practice in drug discovery through a collaborative ecosystem of patients, clinicians, academics, industries, policy makers, regulators & payers.

Features.title: Equity Market
Features.text: Portfolio management with real-time risk adjusted active and alternate securities investments. AI-driven risk assessment models evaluate an investor's risk tolerance based on various factors such as age, financial goals, income stability, insurance, long-term to short term liquidity, and expenses, providing a more accurate risk profile.

Features.title: Posture Defender
Features.text: Secure technology strategy defense and real-time mitigation management product. provides detailed visibility into the security state of your assets and workloads, and provides hardening guidance to help you efficiently and effectively improve your security posture. Continually assesses your resources against security standards that are defined for your cloud subscriptions, accounts, and projects. Defender for Cloud issues security recommendations based on these assessments.
